settings.heading: Meet Our Excellent Customer Care Team
settings.detail:
Our dedicated 15-person support staff is available via Phone, Chat, or Support Ticket.

If you have a question about a product, need help placing an order,

or need a detailed and competitive mailbox quote for your next project, we can help.

settings.heading: Best Value. Outstanding Service.
settings.detail: For over a decade, Mailbox Depot USA has provided top-quality mailbox brands at competitive prices, accompanied by some of the best customer services in the industry. Our support and sales teams are trained to assist customers like you, whether it means answering your questions about a product or providing you with a detailed quote.
Since then, we have grown to house a dedicated 15-person support staff, have served over 70,000 customers, and have fulfilled over 80,000 orders.

settings.heading1: Why We Are The #1 Online Mailbox Retailer
settings.detail1: Our customers trust us, and with good reason. Unlike big-box retail stores with a million categories and zero product or sales expertise, we know what we're about and can help you through every step of the buying process. Check out our excellent TrustPilot Score.
settings.heading2: We Understand Our Customers and Their Needs
settings.detail2: Home of the largest online selection of residential and community mailboxes online, our company has been a supplier for residential and commercial developers since 2008. Since then, we have maintained an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau, received the "Dealer of Excellence" award from Florence Mailboxes Manufacturing Company, and have joined the ranks of Google Trusted Stores -- all because we go the extra mile to serve our customers.
settings.heading3: We Are an Authorized Dealer for Leading Brands
settings.detail3: Our company remains one of the leading authorized dealers for USPS approved cluster mailboxes and 4C horizontal mailboxes for both outdoor and indoor applications. We also carry leading brands like Whitehall, Gaines, and Imperial. With over 70,000 satisfied customers, we hope to provide expert service and quality products to businesses and developers for many years to come.
